tool_description: Microlink API provides a powerful API for automating any browser action.
title: Microlink API
pricing: FREE endpoint available with daily rate limit, PRO endpoint requires authentication.

api_list.name: retrieve_metadata
api_list.sample_code:
import requests

url = 'https://api.microlink.io'
params = {'url': 'https://github.com'}
response = requests.get(url, params=params)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: take_screenshot
api_list.description: Take a screenshot of the target website.
api_list.sample_code:
import requests

url = 'https://api.microlink.io'
params = {'url': 'https://github.com', 'screenshot': True}
response = requests.get(url, params=params)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: filter_data
api_list.description: Filter specific data fields from response payload.
api_list.sample_code:
import requests

url = 'https://api.microlink.io'
params = {'url': 'https://news.ycombinator.com', 'filter': 'url,title'}
response = requests.get(url, params=params)
print(response.json())
